meanings.definition: Affected with motion sickness while traveling in a car.
meanings.sent1: She felt carsick on the long road trip.
meanings.sent2: The child became carsick during the bumpy ride.
meanings.sent3: Even the thought of a car ride made her feel carsick.
meanings.sent4: The winding roads left her feeling carsick and dizzy.
meanings.sent5: The carsick passenger clutched onto the seat, trying to calm their stomach.

meanings.definition: Feeling nauseous or ill due to motion while in a car.
meanings.sent1: He turned pale, feeling carsick from the constant movement.
meanings.sent2: The winding roads made her carsick within minutes.
meanings.sent3: The carsick driver had to pull over to avoid an accident.
meanings.sent4: The carsick feeling lingered long after the journey ended.
meanings.sent5: The carsick sensation crept up on her as the car sped around the corner.
